title: Decoding Mike Parker
content:
[http://www.typeradio.org/loudblog/index.php?id=16](http://web.archive.org/web/20101227161505/http:/www.typeradio.org/loudblog/index.php?id=16 "http://www.typeradio.org/loudblog/index.php?id=16")

How do you spell the name of the designer Mike Parker mentions in the episode mentioned above?  
And also, does anybody now some links or any aditional facts to this story?

All help greatly appreciaded
author: Wiewauters

comments.content:
Aren't we still waiting for Mike to produce the smoking gun on this one? Maybe at TypeCon? ;-) or maybe not.

I love this from MyFonts...

"In obscure journals the controversy rages on..."

You can hear Laurence's voice when you read it in your head. Great stuff.
